Nialé malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nyocha na n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ ghọrọ onye isi ndị ọrụ na Prime Minister site na 1991 ruo 2000 mgbe a kpọgara ya na Ministry of the Economy and Finance dị ka  osote onye isi ndị ọrụ na Ministry of the Economy and Finance

Site na 2003 ruo 2005, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi ndị ọrụ na Minister of Crafts and Supervision of Informal Sector tupu a họpụta ya dị ka onye isi njikwa nke Côte d'Ivoire Tourisme site na 2005 ruo 2007
A họpụtara ya Minister of Housing Promotion of Côte d
'Ivoire na gọọmentị Prime Minister Guillaume Soro, na-eje ozi site na 2011 ruo 2012

Nialé pụtara nwanyị mbụ ga-eduzi Mịnịstrị na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na ego na Côte d'Ivoire mgbe onye isi ala Alassane Ouattara họpụtara ya na 22 Nọvemba 2012 wee jee ozi ruo Jenụwarị 2016 mgbe e zigara ya na Mịnịstrị nke Atụmatụ na Mmepe

N'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na ego, akụ na ụba Ivorian nwetara ọnụego uto kwa afọ nke ruru 9% ma bụrụ otu n'ime akụ na ụba kachasị ike na Africa site n'aka ụlọ ọrụ mba ụwa dịka Moody's na Fitch.
